QUESTIONS - TTS: You are embarking on a long and dangerous journey. Do you bring extra luck? Or courage.

Do you prefer the feeling of sand or moss between your bare toes?

QUESTIONS - TTS: Would you rather stroll on a cloud or on a sand dune?
